comments.text: Literally the 3rd car coming across the border took me to Switzerland.

2 guys, weekday

Managed to get ride to Feldkirch in 5 minutes, should be no problem, a lot of cars going that direction.

Direction Feldkirch (Austria).
We started hitch-hiking here late Thursday afternoon and in about 2 minutes were picked up by friendly police officers who took us to the Austrian border.
To go direction Austria, i ve been taken quickly with a Feldkirch pannel

We catch man from Tunis.  
This place is very sunny, so worse option for hot summer days. But you have chance to get on south.
Quit some people heading up to Malbun to escape the heat in the valley.
